title: President strongly condemns Karachi blast targeting Chinese nationals
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 26 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi Tuesday strongly condemned the attack that took place in Karachi targeting the Chinese nationals.
The president expressed grief over the loss of lives in the incident and sympathized with the bereaved families of the Chinese nationals.
“Pakistan will take the terrorists involved in the incidents to the task. Our hearts go out to the Chinese people in this hour of distress,” he remarked.
